name: H?ma Hunter Lime: Special Collection Vol. 2
description:
H?ma Hunter Lime: Special Collection Vol. 2 contains the following games:
  • H?ma Hunter Lime Dai-4 Wa ("Act 5")
  • H?ma Hunter Lime Dai-5 Wa ("Act 6")
  • A new episode ("Act 7") dedicated to an unfamiliar BEM renowned for its melancholic mood
  • H?ma Hunter Lime Dai-6 Wa ("Act 8")
All the episode have voice overs, which were not present in the original releases, as well as slight interface and visual modifications. There are no subtitles or other text display besides menu options.
